title: Tue Nguyen
text:
I am a final-year master’s student in Data Science for Economics at the University of Milan in Italy. Prior to this, I received a liberal arts-based bachelor’s degree in Finance-Banking from Tan Tao University in Vietnam.
I am passionate about data science and have had 5 wonderful years working in this field in diverse roles, including Business Intelligence Engineer at Amazon, Data Scientist and Research Engineer at Trusting Social, and Data Specialist at Sentifi AG. Currently, I am pivoting toward academic research, focusing on applying quantitative and computational methods to social sciences.
